main event: A sighting of an unidentified object over the Atlantic Ocean east of Bermuda Island on December 17, 1957.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a shape resembling a pencil to round,The observed size ranged from that of a dime to a pea,The object was white and red in color and had a short trail of sparks,Four crew members on a reconnaissance mission witnessed the object at a speed much faster than their aircraft,The sighting lasted approximately 5 seconds.
witness description: crew members of a weather reconnaissance squadron
